message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, considering the value it brings. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? This would be a good deal for both of us and allows us to move forward.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
